CaseStudyPageComp.name: MammyBeans
CaseStudyPageComp.title: MammyBeans updates customers of their orders via MSG91
CaseStudyPageComp.features: WhatsApp • MSG91 Chatbot • OTP • Programmable SMS
CaseStudyPageComp.caseStudies: MammyBeans is a community‑centric FoodTech platform with a vision to empower homemakers—especially mothers—by turning their culinary skills into a sustainable income source, while ensuring every home can order fresh, homemade meals easily.
problem:
• Lengthy, multi‑step online booking process frustrated customers.
  • Difficulty in reaching out to the brand for support or order changes.
  • Fragmented order management and customer queries across multiple channels.

htmlcontent:
WhatsApp‑Based Chatbot
  • Deployed MSG91Bot to handle the entire order flow within WhatsApp.

Product Catalog Integration
  • Enabled MammyBeans to upload and manage rotating meal menus directly in chat.
  • Customers view daily offerings without leaving WhatsApp.

Streamlined Booking Flow
  • Guided selection of meals, quantities, and delivery address.
  • Integrated WhatsApp Payments or UPI links for instant checkout—all under 2 minutes.

Instant Order Updates
  • Automated WhatsApp messages acknowledge each order in real time.
  • Delivery timelines and status updates sent without manual effort.

Smart Support & Handoff
  • Bot handles FAQs and simple queries.
  • Complex issues are seamlessly routed to MammyBeans’ team via MSG91’s multi‑agent handoff feature.
solution.extra: This way MammyBeans has been able to establish and maintain an effective communication with customers via WhatsApp using MSG91 Bot.

CaseStudyPageComp.benefit: As a Result it reduced booking friction by over 60%, increased daily user engagement on WhatsApp, leading to high repeat rates, Scalable platform that maintains an emotional connection with homemaker‑entrepreneurs.
